menu.name: YT Animation Peril
menu.desc: Options, for YouTube Animation Peril and Psych UI, of course!

checkbox.name: Colored Time Bar
checkbox.desc: Makes the time bar color based on the opponent's health bar color.

checkbox.name: Score Text Zoom
checkbox.desc: Makes the score text squash every hit.

number.name: Health Icon Alpha
number.desc: Changes the opacity of the health icons to what's specified.

checkbox.name: Health Bar Overlay
checkbox.desc: Gives the health bar some kind of overlay.

checkbox.name: Health Bar Lerp
checkbox.desc: Makes the health bar smoother, I think.
